pr_title: Add colony event log to Town Hall

timeline.message:
Initial Partial implementation

 * Add citizen spawn IColonyEvents
 * Add IColonyEvent handling to Town Hall Gui

Change colony log to new IColonyEventDescription instead of IColonyEvent

 * Add citizen death event
 * Fix some issues
 * undo like half the changes of the last commit
 * The base systems should work now

Add building events(not fully implemented)

 * replace all tabs with spaces everywhere in the source code.
 * fix death message formatting

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/version/1.15' into
feature/colony_event_log

Seems like this class got merged in some strange way

This should fix it.

Add CitizenGrownUpEvent

also make CitizenDiedEvent a subclass of AbstractCitizenEvent(formerly
AbstractCitizenSpawnEvent)
formatting
formatting
Merge branch 'version/1.15' into feature/colony_event_log

Add a button switching between colony and permission events

Also group some more of the town hall lang entries together, but its
still not nearly all of them.

Improve building name shown in colony event log

also undo a formatting change in TranslationConstants

improve translation constants

 * Move the townhall gui translation keys from WindowTownHall to
TranslationConstants
 * add NonNls annotation to raid name TranslationConstants
 * make some formatting more consistent

remove todo for a better way to detect upgrading

cast work order to WorkOrderBuild instead of WorkOrderBuildBuilding
